name: Big screen dreams
description: With groundbreaking technology and a unique cinema experience, today IMAX theatres are not only loved by audiences but championed by pioneering filmmakers like Christopher Nolan and James Cameron. Yet the route to get there was an unconventional one.

key_work.title: IMAX
key_work.brief_description: More than 50 years since it debuted at EXPO ‘67 in Montreal, IMAX has become synonymous with cinematic innovation, championed by pioneering filmmakers like Christopher Nolan, James Cameron and J.J. Abrams.

constellations_primary.name: Big screen dreams
constellations_primary.description: With groundbreaking technology and a unique cinema experience, today IMAX theatres are not only loved by audiences but championed by pioneering filmmakers like Christopher Nolan and James Cameron. Yet the route to get there was an unconventional one.

start.title: IMAX
start.brief_description: More than 50 years since it debuted at EXPO ‘67 in Montreal, IMAX has become synonymous with cinematic innovation, championed by pioneering filmmakers like Christopher Nolan, James Cameron and J.J. Abrams.

constellations_primary.name: Big screen dreams
constellations_primary.description: With groundbreaking technology and a unique cinema experience, today IMAX theatres are not only loved by audiences but championed by pioneering filmmakers like Christopher Nolan and James Cameron. Yet the route to get there was an unconventional one.

end.title: In the Labyrinth
end.brief_description: A multi-image large-format film retelling of the Greek myth of Theseus and symbolizing the life of a modern man; each one in a personal labyrinth that must find their own path to triumph.

constellations_other.name: Big screen dreams
constellations_other.description: With groundbreaking technology and a unique cinema experience, today IMAX theatres are not only loved by audiences but championed by pioneering filmmakers like Christopher Nolan and James Cameron. Yet the route to get there was an unconventional one.

links.description: IMAX goes back to 1967 when a group of Canadian experimental filmmakers debuted a retelling of the Theseus myth, In The Labyrinth, which was groundbreaking for using 35 mm and 70 mm film projected simultaneously on to multiple screens: a precursors to IMAX technology.

start.title: In the Labyrinth
start.brief_description: A multi-image large-format film retelling of the Greek myth of Theseus and symbolizing the life of a modern man; each one in a personal labyrinth that must find their own path to triumph.

constellations_other.name: Big screen dreams
constellations_other.description: With groundbreaking technology and a unique cinema experience, today IMAX theatres are not only loved by audiences but championed by pioneering filmmakers like Christopher Nolan and James Cameron. Yet the route to get there was an unconventional one.

end.title: T-Rex: Back to the Cretaceous
end.brief_description: Ally Hayden shares her father’s interest in dinosaurs and archaeology. When he brings a mysterious fossil home, she’s convinced it’s a T-rex egg and isn’t wrong. When it breaks open she’s has visions of the Cretaceous period.

constellations_other.name: Big screen dreams
constellations_other.description: With groundbreaking technology and a unique cinema experience, today IMAX theatres are not only loved by audiences but championed by pioneering filmmakers like Christopher Nolan and James Cameron. Yet the route to get there was an unconventional one.

links.description: In The Labyrinth inspired filmmaker Norman Jewison to recreate similar techniques in The Thomas Crown Affair a year later. However, to expand their appeal, over the next 30 years IMAX became known for their documentaries like T-Rex: Back To The Cretaceous.

start.title: The Dark Knight
start.creator_credit: Charles Roven, Christopher Nolan, Emma Thomas, Lorne Orleans and Isobel Griffiths
start.headline_credit: United Kingdom and United States of America, 2008
start.brief_description: From the opening sequence to the final frame, Christopher Nolan’s The Dark Knight never wastes a moment. Featuring Heath Ledger’s legendary, Oscar-winning performance as the Joker, action-packed set pieces and philosophical musings not seen in superhero movies, The Dark Knight is one of the best.

constellations_other.name: Big screen dreams
constellations_other.description: With groundbreaking technology and a unique cinema experience, today IMAX theatres are not only loved by audiences but championed by pioneering filmmakers like Christopher Nolan and James Cameron. Yet the route to get there was an unconventional one.

constellations_other.name: Oscar-winning transformations and prosthetics
constellations_other.description: This Constellation explores how craft help actors undergo award-winning transformations into iconic characters.

end.title: Hello
end.brief_description: Adele’s music video for Hello, directed by Canadian actor and director Xavier Dolan.

constellations_other.name: Big screen dreams
constellations_other.description: With groundbreaking technology and a unique cinema experience, today IMAX theatres are not only loved by audiences but championed by pioneering filmmakers like Christopher Nolan and James Cameron. Yet the route to get there was an unconventional one.

links.description: The Dark Knight director Christopher Nolan wanted to shoot in IMAX for years before successfully doing so. Later, Adele’s song ‘Hello’ would be the first music video filmed with IMAX cameras.

start.title: T-Rex: Back to the Cretaceous
start.brief_description: Ally Hayden shares her father’s interest in dinosaurs and archaeology. When he brings a mysterious fossil home, she’s convinced it’s a T-rex egg and isn’t wrong. When it breaks open she’s has visions of the Cretaceous period.

constellations_other.name: Big screen dreams
constellations_other.description: With groundbreaking technology and a unique cinema experience, today IMAX theatres are not only loved by audiences but championed by pioneering filmmakers like Christopher Nolan and James Cameron. Yet the route to get there was an unconventional one.

end.title: Ghosts of the Abyss
end.creator_credit: Chuck Comisky, James Cameron, Janace Tashjian and John Bruno
end.headline_credit: Mexico and United States of America, 2003
end.brief_description: Academy Award® winning director and master storyteller James Cameron journeys back to the site of his greatest inspiration, the legendary wreck of the Titanic.

constellations_other.name: Big screen dreams
constellations_other.description: With groundbreaking technology and a unique cinema experience, today IMAX theatres are not only loved by audiences but championed by pioneering filmmakers like Christopher Nolan and James Cameron. Yet the route to get there was an unconventional one.

links.description: IMAX succeeded with large-scale documentary films to appeal to student and museum crowds but also mainstream audiences because of the impressive visuals. James Cameron was one of the first directors to realise the potential of the format with Ghosts of the Abyss.

start.title: Ghosts of the Abyss
start.creator_credit: Chuck Comisky, James Cameron, Janace Tashjian and John Bruno
start.headline_credit: Mexico and United States of America, 2003
start.brief_description: Academy Award® winning director and master storyteller James Cameron journeys back to the site of his greatest inspiration, the legendary wreck of the Titanic.

constellations_other.name: Big screen dreams
constellations_other.description: With groundbreaking technology and a unique cinema experience, today IMAX theatres are not only loved by audiences but championed by pioneering filmmakers like Christopher Nolan and James Cameron. Yet the route to get there was an unconventional one.

end.title: Avatar
end.creator_credit: James Cameron, Jon Landau, Andrew M. Collins, Billy-Vu Lam, Bruno Parenti, Cameron Coombs, Chris Fregoso, Chris Haney, Chris Radcliffe, Chun Seong Ng, C. Jerome Williams, Gizmo Rivera, Jarrod Avalos, Joe Harkins, Kenneth Quinn Brown, Kim LeBrane, Krystal Sae Eua, Laura Sevilla, Leonardo Martinez, Loeng Wong-Savun, Marco Capparelli, Marcus Erbar, Miguel A. Guerrero, Robert Hubbard, Shigeharu Tomotoshi, Tamer Eldib, T.J. Burke, Tony Meagher, Tulio Hernandez and York N. Schueller
end.headline_credit: United Kingdom and United States of America, 2009
end.brief_description: In the 22nd century, a paraplegic Marine is dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission, but becomes torn between following orders and protecting an alien civilization.

constellations_other.name: Big screen dreams
constellations_other.description: With groundbreaking technology and a unique cinema experience, today IMAX theatres are not only loved by audiences but championed by pioneering filmmakers like Christopher Nolan and James Cameron. Yet the route to get there was an unconventional one.

constellations_other.name: Mayes C Rubeo
constellations_other.description: Emmy-award winning and Oscar-nominated costume designer Mayes C Rubeo has worked on some of Hollywood's biggest blockbusters, designing costumes for characters and creatures across time, space and everything in between.

links.description: In the wake of the box-office breaking Titanic, Cameron teamed up with Bill Paxton for Ghosts of the Abyss which saw them explore the sunken wreck for the first time. The documentary was shown in IMAX 3D, as was Cameron’s biggest hit: Avatar.

start.title: Avatar
start.creator_credit: James Cameron, Jon Landau, Andrew M. Collins, Billy-Vu Lam, Bruno Parenti, Cameron Coombs, Chris Fregoso, Chris Haney, Chris Radcliffe, Chun Seong Ng, C. Jerome Williams, Gizmo Rivera, Jarrod Avalos, Joe Harkins, Kenneth Quinn Brown, Kim LeBrane, Krystal Sae Eua, Laura Sevilla, Leonardo Martinez, Loeng Wong-Savun, Marco Capparelli, Marcus Erbar, Miguel A. Guerrero, Robert Hubbard, Shigeharu Tomotoshi, Tamer Eldib, T.J. Burke, Tony Meagher, Tulio Hernandez and York N. Schueller
start.headline_credit: United Kingdom and United States of America, 2009
start.brief_description: In the 22nd century, a paraplegic Marine is dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission, but becomes torn between following orders and protecting an alien civilization.

constellations_other.description: With groundbreaking technology and a unique cinema experience, today IMAX theatres are not only loved by audiences but championed by pioneering filmmakers like Christopher Nolan and James Cameron. Yet the route to get there was an unconventional one.

constellations_other.name: Mayes C Rubeo
constellations_other.description: Emmy-award winning and Oscar-nominated costume designer Mayes C Rubeo has worked on some of Hollywood's biggest blockbusters, designing costumes for characters and creatures across time, space and everything in between.

end.title: The Dark Knight
end.creator_credit: Charles Roven, Christopher Nolan, Emma Thomas, Lorne Orleans and Isobel Griffiths
end.headline_credit: United Kingdom and United States of America, 2008
end.brief_description: From the opening sequence to the final frame, Christopher Nolan’s The Dark Knight never wastes a moment. Featuring Heath Ledger’s legendary, Oscar-winning performance as the Joker, action-packed set pieces and philosophical musings not seen in superhero movies, The Dark Knight is one of the best.

constellations_other.name: Big screen dreams
constellations_other.description: With groundbreaking technology and a unique cinema experience, today IMAX theatres are not only loved by audiences but championed by pioneering filmmakers like Christopher Nolan and James Cameron. Yet the route to get there was an unconventional one.

constellations_other.name: Oscar-winning transformations and prosthetics
constellations_other.description: This Constellation explores how craft help actors undergo award-winning transformations into iconic characters.

links.description: Avatar, which was converted to IMAX 3D in post-production, is credited with solidifying IMAX’s status in a competitive theatrical market according. It hit cinemas a year after The Dark Knight, which was the first narrative feature partially shot in the format.

start.title: Hello
start.brief_description: Adele’s music video for Hello, directed by Canadian actor and director Xavier Dolan.

constellations_other.name: Big screen dreams
constellations_other.description: With groundbreaking technology and a unique cinema experience, today IMAX theatres are not only loved by audiences but championed by pioneering filmmakers like Christopher Nolan and James Cameron. Yet the route to get there was an unconventional one.

end.title: Birds of Prey (and the Fantabulous Emancipation of One Harley Quinn)
end.creator_credit: Bryan Unkeless, Margot Robbie and Clubhouse Pictures
end.brief_description: After splitting with the Joker, Harley Quinn joins superheroes Black Canary, Huntress and Renee Montoya to save a young girl from an evil crime lord.

constellations_other.name: Pink subversions
constellations_other.description: Pink dominates Angela Tiatia's The Dark Current. The artist describes this particular colour as “artificial”, “unapologetic” and “pulsating with feminine energy”. In Tiatia's Sāmoan heritage “there is a brashness in the use of colour. I really wanted to embody that.”

constellations_other.name: Gender avengers
constellations_other.description: Thelma and Louise and Promising Young Woman both celebrate women taking revenge on men who sexually assault them, although victory is temporary as the characters perish because of their choices.

constellations_other.name: Big screen dreams
constellations_other.description: With groundbreaking technology and a unique cinema experience, today IMAX theatres are not only loved by audiences but championed by pioneering filmmakers like Christopher Nolan and James Cameron. Yet the route to get there was an unconventional one.

constellations_other.name: Diamonds are still a girl's best friend
constellations_other.description: This constellation explores the continuing cultural impact of Marylin Monroe’s iconic performance of 'Diamonds are a Girl’s Best Friend' in Gentlemen prefer Blondes (1953).

links.description: ‘Hello’ made Adele the first artist in history to shoot a music video for IMAX. Another groundbreaking female is Cathy Yan whose movie Birds of Prey was released in IMAX and made her the first Asian American woman to direct a superhero blockbuster.
